name: FireOc Demo
description:
Indie Game made by a Young Mind
Game full version link will be here:
[Still on development]

FireOc is a Platformer game based on games like [Blue Speed Guy] and [Red Piper], you objective is save your cousin who was trying to find some magic cubes that contains unknown power but was kidnapped by the Villain. The levels that you explore are very similiar to basic platformer game levels("Grass", Water, Night).
This game is also sometimes nonsense kinda like [Red Piper] do on Water Levels.

How to download the game:
1. Install the game
2. Extract the .Zip file
3. Choose your version
3.5 Delete the unnecessary versions
4. Play the game

Have Fun!
